issues.info: This issues are shown once after your backend was started and found this issues. You can dismiss them, they will not show again until a restart. It is still recommended to take care of them.
issues.systemPythonDeprecated: You System is using an older version of Python than needed in the future. You will not be able to do updates.
issues.noInternetConnection: You seem to have no internet connection, this will result in wrong time. Since you have the microservice activated, please consider adjusting time manually, otherwise send data is faulty!
issues.configSetToDefault: The faulty config was set the the default, please adjust it:
